title: Got left to defend lane by myself as nunu supp last game :(
body:
Whole team was raging
Everyone be hating
Except me who was doing the worst of them all

replies.body: i feel your pain, im a support main, its a bad life.

{{champion:412}} *Hooks n' Flays*
{{champion:81}} *All he does is pretty much steal it*

{{champion:84}} **gj Ez!!**
{{champion:412}} **...gj**
Do something above what's expected of you as a support and you'll be praised for it...

aha i was feeling the  pain as well in normals got stuck 1v2 with sona butâ€¦ they went all adc every lane except  there was a teemo mid but what was funny was i ended up 27/3 able to 1v2 bot lane like 3, 4 times and then everyone was calling me god aha could say silver adc's suck
